message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and potential worth, which I believe could greatly benefit you. Considering its exceptional qualities and the time it took to curate this masterpiece, I am extending an exclusive offer for you to purchase it at $2000000. I trust that this investment will not only add value to your collection but also serve as a testament to your discerning taste. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can assist you in making your decision.
